howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get started in under a minute

connect.title: Connect phones
connect.description: Pair your iPhones together. They sync automatically over Wi-Fi.

start.title: Start your session
start.description: Choose from five start methods—flying start, touch release, countdown, voice commands, or start in frame.

position.title: Position your phone
position.description: Place your phone at the finish line. No calibration needed.

time.title: Get your time
time.description: Run your sprint and get instant results with millisecond accuracy.

features.title: Professional timing, zero equipment
features.subtitle: Everything you need is already in your pocket

smartDetection.title: Smart Detection
smartDetection.description: Camera-based motion detection triggers timing automatically when you cross the line.

multiDeviceSync.title: Multi-Device Sync
multiDeviceSync.description: Connect iPhones wirelessly. Millisecond-accurate clock synchronization between gates.

instantResults.title: Instant Results
instantResults.description: See your time the moment you cross. No manual stopwatch delays.

trackProgress.title: Track Progress
trackProgress.description: Save sessions, view history, and track improvement over time.

startTypes.title: Five ways to start your sprint
startTypes.subtitle: Choose the start method that matches your training goals

flying.title: Flying Start
flying.description: Run through at full speed. First gate crossing starts the timer automatically. Perfect for max velocity testing.

touch.title: Touch Release
touch.description: Place finger on screen, lift to start. Captures reaction time just like blocks at a real track meet.

countdown.title: Countdown
countdown.description: 3... 2... 1... BEEP! A visual and audio countdown gives you a predictable start signal. Great for consistent training.

voice.title: Voice Command
voice.description: "On your marks... Set... GO!" AI voice commands with realistic timing based on official rules.

frame.title: Start in Frame
frame.description: Begin stationary in the camera view, then take off. Timer starts when you leave the frame. No second device needed.

multiDevice.title: Connect multiple phones for precise timing
multiDevice.description: Use one iPhone at the start line and another at the finish. Add more phones for split times at any distance.

wirelessConnection.title: Wireless Connection
wirelessConnection.description: Phones connect automatically via peer-to-peer WiFi. No internet required.

millisecondSync.title: Millisecond-Accurate Sync
millisecondSync.description: NTP-style clock synchronization ensures accurate timing across devices.

unlimitedGates.title: Unlimited Gates
unlimitedGates.description: Add split timing with 3+ phones. Track acceleration phases and top speed.

comparison.title: How we compare
comparison.subtitle: Professional timing without the professional price tag

footnotes.browerStudy: **Per <link>peer-reviewed study</link>: Brower found "not reliable enough to monitor small changes for elite athletes"
footnotes.beamNote: Beam systems trigger on any body part (hand/leg), not chest. TrackSpeed is designed for training, not official competition.

timingTechnology.title: The science behind sub-frame precision
timingTechnology.subtitle: How we achieve ~4ms accuracy with standard iPhone cameras
timingTechnology.formulaResult: Solve for crossing time with sub-frame precision

motionDetection.title: Motion Detection
motionDetection.description: Frame differencing identifies moving objects. Blob analysis finds the largest motion region (your body) and tracks its leading edge toward the gate.

trajectoryRegression.title: Trajectory Regression
trajectoryRegression.description: We track position across multiple frames and use linear regression to calculate the precise moment you crossed the gate line—even between frames.

rollingShutterCorrection.title: Rolling Shutter Correction
rollingShutterCorrection.description: iPhone cameras scan top-to-bottom over ~5-12ms. We measure where you crossed vertically and compensate for the exact scan timing at that position.

effectiveAccuracy.title: ~4ms Effective Accuracy
effectiveAccuracy.description: The combination of 120fps capture, multi-frame trajectory analysis, and rolling shutter correction delivers timing precision comparable to professional systems.
